face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

pinyin: tu2 xing2 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4
ben3 di4 guan3 li3 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用户界面旋钮型的直观且易于使用。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕显示，人机对话，图形显示界面。

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的电荷转移是反应的速度控制步。

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种智能仪表交互界面的软件开发自动化技术。

sentences.english: Making use of the expression of the image-force, we analyze the interaction of the dislocation with the interface and the boundary.
sentences.chinese: 通过像力公式可以分析自由边界和界面对位错的作用。

sentences.english: One major concern for a rich user interface is layout management.
sentences.chinese: 对于富用户界面，一个重要的方面就是布局管理。

sentences.english: The semantic representation of topic structure is mapped onto syntax by GFT interface.
sentences.chinese: 主题结构的语义通过语法功能层界面影射到句法。

sentences.english: This is a human-computer game players, a character interface, the entry-level.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个人机对战游戏，字符界面，入门级别。

sentences.english: It also provides a simple one-button interface for uninstalling these apps.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它也提供了用来卸载这些软件的一键式界面。

sentences.english: New features include equalisation technology and a user-friendly interface.
sentences.chinese: 新功能包括均衡技术，以及友好的用户界面。

sentences.english: Rescheduling could be done primarily through a new point-and-click interface.
sentences.chinese: 修改计划基本上能通过新的单击界面完成。

sentences.english: Each of these participants provides services and realizes capabilities according to the service interface.
sentences.chinese: 每一个参与者都根据服务界面来提供服务并实现功能。

sentences.english: The hydroxyapatite-coated prosthesis helped to reduce stress difference at bone and prosthesis interface.
sentences.chinese: 羟磷灰石表面涂层假体能缓和界面层的应力差异。
考虑界面效应的相域法。

sentences.english: However, the interface is slightly cluttered and the selection of hotels is limited.
sentences.chinese: 但是界面设计有点过于紧凑，酒店的选择也非常有限。

sentences.english: Behind the new interface, you’ll find some new applications as well.
sentences.chinese: 伴随新界面而来的是一些新的应用程序。

definition: home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
